data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Erongo, Namibia to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Erongo, Namibia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 16,463 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Erongo.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Erongo, Namibia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Erongo, Namibia to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 132,000 citizens of Erongo, Namibia, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Erongo, Namibia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 16,463 believers in Erongo that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.
